DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis project examine whether integrated health care program intervention group reduce recurrence mortality coronary artery-related disease traditional one comparison group .
DOC.brief_title: Development Efficacy Evaluation Integrated Chronic Care Health Promotion Model Patients With Coronary Artery Disease Taiwan
DOC.criteria: patient suffer acute myocardial infarction stable angina intervention ( CABG PTCA ) 1 . Age > 85 yr old . 2 . Worse shortterm prognosis ( e.g.cancer , congestive heart failure NYHA IV ) 3 . Any systemic disease limit exercise program ( e.g . bedridden stroke ) 4 . Unable participate trial due logic reason
